title: Billionaire hedge funder hands over $70M in stolen antiquities
content:
1. Billionaire hedge funder hands over $70M in stolen antiquities  New York Post
  2. New York billionaire Michael Steinhardt surrenders $70 million of stolen ancient art  CNN
  3. Billionaire surrenders $70 million in stolen artifacts to 11 countries, officials say  Kansas City Star
  4. Michael Steinhardt, Billionaire, Surrenders $70 Million in Stolen Relics  The New York Times
  5. Avoiding trial, a former hedge fund manager turns over $70 million in stolen antiques  NPR
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
